00028 class Color {
00029     public:
00037         enum SystemColorId {
00039             ClientBackground = 0,
00041             ClientForeground = 1,
00043             ActiveFrameBackground = 2,

00065             InactiveWindowTitle = 13,
00066             SystemColorIdCount = 14 // mandatory last entry
00067         };

00116
